title: Pfizer's New Omicron-Targeting Booster Produces Strong Immune Response
author: Jared S Hopkins
description: The preliminary data results are the first from human testing of the shots in people at least 18 years old.
cleaned_text: Oct. 13, 2022 10:35 am ET The retooled Covid-19 booster from Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE generated a strong immune response against the Omicron substrains BA.4 and BA.5, the companies said.
